about_the_game:
🧡 A GAME CREATED BY THE COZY COMMUNITY, FOR THE COZY COMMUNITY!

This DEMO includes a short introductionary part (~20 minutes) of the "Tailside: Cozy Cafe Sim" game. If you would like to keep up with all the new development updates and what's to come next, feel free to +follow, join our Discord or follow on social media!

A charming RPG where you'll discover the joys of running your own cozy cafe in a pixel-perfect world. From brewing the perfect cup of coffee to making friends with the locals, experience a blend of relaxation and adventure during your own coffee break.

☕️ PREPARE COFFEE

Master the art of coffee-making as you fulfill various coffee orders:

🌱 Prepare different types of coffee

🌱 Unlock new options through upgrades

🌱 DEMO: Prepare 3 different types of coffee

🎨 DECORATE THE CAFE

Personalize every corner of your cafe to your own unique taste:

🌱 Fully customizable cafe

🌱 Different decoration categories

🌱 DEMO: Try out a few decor sets

👥 MEET VILLAGERS

Meet cute villagers that will help you through out your journey

🌱 Receive helpful tips from your new friends

🌱 Interact and learn their unique stories

🌱 DEMO: First 2 NPC encounters and tiny customers

🦊 FOLLOW FOR MORE NEWS AND MONTHLY UPDATES ON NEW FEATURES

This game is being developed based on community feedback. Join us and watch the game expand, playtest various versions, and suggest your own ideas to be added!
detailed_description:
Roadmap

🛠️ CURRENT DEVELOPMENT PROGRESS:

🛠️ General Upcoming Early Access Features:

🟠 Expanded different drink recipes: In progress

🟠 Expanded decor: In progress

🟠 New characters and stories: In progress

🟠 Village (NPC) customers: In progress

🟢 Day and night cycle: COMPLETED

🟢 Bedroom area: COMPLETED

🔴 Achievements: Not started

🟠 Controller support: In progress (in testing stage)

🟠 Accessibility: In progress (missing font settings, UI size, day & night length)

🟢 Save & Load system: COMPLETED

🛠️ Fundraiser Stretch Goals Features:

🔴 Sandbox mode: Not started

🔴 Cafe Terrace area: Not started

🟠 Plushie Decor Set: In progress

🔴 Greenhouse: Not started

🟢 Soundtrack DLC: COMPLETED

🟠 Exclusive woodland DLCs: In progress

🟠 Twitch integration: In progress

🛠️ Extra features:

🟠 Skill Tree: In progress

🟢 Custom Character Import: COMPLETED

🔴 More to be revealed


About the Demo

🧡 A GAME CREATED BY THE COZY COMMUNITY, FOR THE COZY COMMUNITY!

This DEMO includes a short introductionary part (~20 minutes) of the "Tailside: Cozy Cafe Sim" game. If you would like to keep up with all the new development updates and what's to come next, feel free to +follow, join our Discord or follow on social media!

A charming RPG where you'll discover the joys of running your own cozy cafe in a pixel-perfect world. From brewing the perfect cup of coffee to making friends with the locals, experience a blend of relaxation and adventure during your own coffee break.

☕️ PREPARE COFFEE

Master the art of coffee-making as you fulfill various coffee orders:

🌱 Prepare different types of coffee

🌱 Unlock new options through upgrades

🌱 DEMO: Prepare 3 different types of coffee

🎨 DECORATE THE CAFE

Personalize every corner of your cafe to your own unique taste:

🌱 Fully customizable cafe

🌱 Different decoration categories

🌱 DEMO: Try out a few decor sets

👥 MEET VILLAGERS

Meet cute villagers that will help you through out your journey

🌱 Receive helpful tips from your new friends

🌱 Interact and learn their unique stories

🌱 DEMO: First 2 NPC encounters and tiny customers

🦊 FOLLOW FOR MORE NEWS AND MONTHLY UPDATES ON NEW FEATURES

This game is being developed based on community feedback. Join us and watch the game expand, playtest various versions, and suggest your own ideas to be added!
name: Tailside: Cozy Cafe Sim Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
